labor_categories.labor_category: 4-System - EFX/ XPN/TRU/NSCT Quad Merged Credit Report, Individual

raw_data.title: 4-System - EFX/ XPN/TRU/NSCT Quad Merged Credit Report, Individual
raw_data.description: A combination of the three-system TRU/XPN/EFX credit report and non-standard credit tradeline data.

labor_categories.labor_category: Employment Credit-2 System, Bi-Merge, Employment Report – 2 Repository

raw_data.title: Employment Credit-2 System, Bi-Merge, Employment Report – 2 Repository
raw_data.description: Reliable and timely access to consolidated employment credit information from Experian and TransUnion combined into an easy to read proprietary report.  The Employment Credit Report is specifically designed to give you the pertinent information needed to help make decisions quickly and easily when deciding on potential candidates or re-evaluating current employees. It shows a comprehensive credit history and provides public record information, plus other items individuals don't typically include in job applications. By revealing potential patterns of inability to meet obligations, this report can also help identify applicants or employees who may be financially overextended. The format is also more descriptive than a standard credit report to help interpret the data and make quick, consistent decisions.

labor_categories.labor_category: Employment Credit-3 System, Tri-Merge, Employment Report – 3 Repository

raw_data.title: Employment Credit-3 System, Tri-Merge, Employment Report – 3 Repository
raw_data.description: Provides consolidated consumer credit information from all three credit bureaus combined into an easy to read proprietary report. The Employment Credit Report is specifically designed to give you the pertinent information needed to help make decisions quickly and easily when deciding on potential candidates or re-evaluating current employees. It shows a comprehensive credit history and provides public record information, plus other items individuals don't typically include in job applications. By revealing potential patterns of inability to meet obligations, this report can also help identify applicants or employees who may be financially overextended. The format is also more descriptive than a standard credit report to help interpret the data and make quick, consistent decisions.

raw_data.title: Credit Monitoring
raw_data.description: Tri-merge credit report and credit scores along with one year of unlimited access to your TransUnion credit report and VantageScore® credit score by TransUnion. The daily three-bureau credit monitoring service will notify you if there are any critical changes to your credit files at TransUnion, Experian and Equifax, including fraud alerts, new inquiries, new accounts, new public records, late payments, change of address and more.  The service also includes Dark Web-Internet monitoring, access to an identity restoration program that provides assistance in the event your identity is compromised to help you restore your identity and up to $1,000,000 in identity theft insurance with no deductible. (Policy limitations and exclusions may apply.)

raw_data.title: Continuous Vetting Service
raw_data.description: Continuous Vetting:  Analysis using Publicly Available Electronic Information (PAEI), Publicly Available Social Media Information (PASMI), Commercial Data Checks (CDC), online presence, and deep and dark web data. Trigger Analysis searches available data for predetermined triggers in public records, PAEI, internet presence and social media activities on a recurring basis. This is Security Executive Agent Directive 5 compliant and meets the Federal Adjudicative Guideline requirements. The frequency of checks is determined by the customer. Reports are delivered to the designated customer representative(s) when a trigger is tripped or at their request.

raw_data.title: Reference/Update, Reference/Update - Manual
raw_data.description: Provides credit data and reports that are not available through the automated systems. In some cases, Verato must run the credit search manually and transmit the data in the proper report format.

raw_data.title: Comprehensive Reports
raw_data.description: The latest version of the search and locating technology that revolutionized individual and corporate investigations. Public record reports provide a fast and effective way for Federal, State, and local Governments to search, identify, verify, and locate individuals and businesses.

raw_data.title: Canadian Credit Reports
raw_data.description: This is a report comprised of data received from a CRA based on Canadian data.
